abstract: The award for economics will be made on Monday, and more than a dozen names are being mentioned as possible laureates.
snippet: The award for economics will be made on Monday, and more than a dozen names are being mentioned as possible laureates.
lead_paragraph: The Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Science will be awarded early Monday morning New York time (1 p.m. Swedish time, at the earliest). Every year predictions are made, and the actual winners are not always among the betting pool favorites. (And besides, there are also fewer prominent betting pools available this year.)

headline.main: Economists to Watch for the Nobel Prize
